ygData.subject: SV: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont realy see the problem here, i mean what else can you use your money for than regents. It´s so easy to get your hands on money in Norrath that the only
ygData.messageBody:
i dont realy see the problem here, i mean what else can you use your money for than regents. It�s so easy to get your hands on money in Norrath that the only way you gonna get your hands on some nice items is by trading them. I havent meet many ppl willing to sell there hard earned items for gold.
Verrant are fools who think they shuld keep the number of items down, and with making them lore item and no drop. if this keeps up ill go play AC instead.


/Askur Wizard of Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 8:33 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Leatherskin spell


> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> What is a diference from a leatherskeen to steel skeen? i heared that
> leather is 150 dmg and steal 175 but only 25 hit points dont look to much
> at so high lv MOBs hit for more then 70 a hit and hit 2 or 3 times in round.
>
> I use a leather all time when soloing, less in group i dont cast it only if
> im absolutly sure that nothing dangerus can pass by as i fight mobs wich
> can give 1 or 2 plat a kill it is realy not a problem of money if root hold
> i can kill 2 or 3 before i need to recast leatherskeen and in that time i
> get some 2 plat. so i get at minimum 1 plat counting time to go in shop to
> buy a gems wich i have all time in bunch of 40 pc on me.
>
> And im glad to spend this money for a 30 - 40 times it saves my life.
>
>
>
> At 18.43 06/09/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>
> >
> >I didnt find shieldskin to be of much use. and I mainly only used
> >leatherskin when soloing. But
> >once I got steelskin, I used that spell like crack, I allways have it on me
> >and find it to be VERY
> >usefull.
> >
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> >To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> >Date: Sunday, September 05, 1999 8:23 AM
> >Subject: [eq_wizards] Leatherskin spell
> >
> >
> >>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> >>
> >>Recently made level 24 and was wondering whether or not to buy leatherskin
> >>spell. Has anyone else found this spell useful? The bloodstone component is
> >>over 5 gp each, so it can become expensive to use it often.
> >>
> >>Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
